name: The World´s Hardest Game Custom Edition
name_original: The World´s Hardest Game Custom Edition
description:
in that version V.1.0.0.0 (Initial versión):

-5 levels is an early access game wait for updates to play more levels

you can help me making a donation in itch.io or in game clicking paypal image.

im going to make a button in the main menu of the game to put the donators name and the value of donation
if you like to donate put your name/nick in message/comment or in subject of paypal donation to see and add you
y going to put that only when y receive my first donation :) the missing name in donations y going to put in game as anonymous.

thanks for understand all and support me :)

Changelog Version V.1.0.0.1 ( January 21 of 2017):

-2 New Levels added

-New enemy (The black Ball But Moving in the Other Direction)
